May: Flowers and Airfare Deals
May is blooming with great airfare deals from  CheapAir.com!  Come see our low fares to domestic and international destinations and book your flight today!
Sale fares are valid all summer long. If your plans are flexible, keep in mind: the best deals are available for Tuesday, Wednesday, and Saturday travel.  Other days are slightly more expensive.

For reservations or information, visit us at www.CheapAir.com
or call 1-800-CHEAP-AIR (1-800-243-2724).

Fall in Love with Italy - Packages from $1,599 All-Inclusive***
Low Season Prices for High Season Travel





Fall is the perfect time to "Fall in Love" with Italy.  Eurofly has created 5 special programs to the most desired places in Italy:                            
                              

• Sicily 
• Amalfi Coast 
• Bologna & Tuscany 
• Roman Countryside 
• Abruzzo & Rome 
Prices from $1,599 per person! 

All packages include:


							• Roundtrip air including fuel surcharges 

							• 6-7 nights 4-star hotel depending on package selected 

							• Most meals

							• Excursions

							• Hotel taxes & service charges

							• Transfers and more 
Abruzzo/Rome package includes cooking classes!

Hurry, vacations at these prices will sell out quickly!
